name: Prawnageddon - A shrimpzilla story
description:
From the famed developers of Theresa's Naughty Campaign and Ore Gobbler comes Beetroot Studios' new and exciting project:

Prawnageddon - A Shrimpzilla Story

Play as the only prawn in the world who is fed up of their place in the Food CHAIN, and so attempts to fight their way out. CHAIN together attacks and dashes in order to dodge and kill oncoming predators in order to end up at the top of the food chain!* 

Will you be able to reach the top of the pecking order?

*Terms and Conditions apply, full food chain is not simulated.
